org.jobscheduler.dashboard.web.rest

Class FilterResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jobscheduler.dashboard.web.rest.FilterResource

  • @RestController
public class FilterResource
extends Object
    Filter controller 2 JSON views : - One with FieldSerializer (default serialization) - One without FieldSerializer
    Author:
    cloud
